casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Trust of Dr. Merritt Evan LONDON, M.D., Deceased. C-458 September Term 2017
080114 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 12, 2018

(Mark London & Patricia London Thieffry-Petitioners)

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4693/4746-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
